name: Moment (Alectronas)
description:
Navigate through a series of 10 8-bit puzzle levels where stopping to take a moment to clear your mind illuminates the path forward.

Controls

"W,A,S,D" - Movement

" " - Waiting

ps. Try using the konami code.

Made By:

Mitchell Alfaro

Will Chen

Steve Vatkov

The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection by Subspace Audio
https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
